text.text: Recently I came across Yang Gallery to check out the yayoi kusama collection but was taken away with Wang Guoping's artwork. The use of AR in his art to allow viewers to interact with this art fascinates me! I scanned the QR code and it brings me to a website to scan the artwork. As someone that dabbles with art and culture, this is innovative use of technology with art. Really like it!!!

text.text: Beautiful space with a good range of artworks. Would highly recommend everyone to come by and view the current solo exhibition ‘Zen Meditation’ by Wang GuoPing. Be amazed by a wonderful music performance while viewing the artwork as well.

originalText.text: Beautiful space with a good range of artworks. Would highly recommend everyone to come by and view the current solo exhibition ‘Zen Meditation’ by Wang GuoPing. Be amazed by a wonderful music performance while viewing the artwork as well.

text.text: It’s inside the hotel Voco and you have to walk to the very end of the lobby. The moment you enter it a bell will hit give you a sense that you touching your soul. I quite like the style and the paintings around.

text.text: They were exhibiting Zhang Hui's art work currently and its sooo cute!!! the little faces and chubby cheeks, heard that the artist is focused on bringing out our inner childlike memories with the art works!

text.text:
Wonderful art collection! The pieces are extremely intriguing and beautiful in their own way.

Always a pleasant experience with Susanna, her patience and graciousness is welcoming to everyone.
